japanese:
卒業式が終わったら、すぐ卒業旅行だよね。
五月は準備、終わってる？
translation:
We're going on our graduation trip
right after our graduation ceremony.
Have you finished preparing, Itsuki?

japanese:
もう少しかかりそうです。
まだ持っていくか決めかねている荷物があるので。
translation:
I'll take a little longer.
I still have some things I can't decide
whether to bring or not.

japanese:
荷物が多いなら送っちゃったら？
重いと移動の時に大変だよ？
translation:
If you have too much luggage,
why not send it ahead?
It'll be tough to move around with it being heavy.

japanese: フータローは準備、できてるのかな。
translation: I wonder if Futaro is ready.

japanese: みんな、いい？
translation: Everyone, listen up.

japanese: 二乃？
translation: Nino?

japanese:
旅行へ行く前に、もう一度
はっきりさせておきたいことがあるの。
translation:
There's something I want to clarify once more
before we go on the trip.

japanese: ……なにを？
translation: ...What is it?

japanese:
今回の卒業旅行は、
フー君に答えを出してもらうための舞台。
translation:
This graduation trip is a stage
for Fu-kun to give us an answer.

japanese: それが、私たちの総意ってことでいいのよね？
translation: We are all thinking this way, aren't we?

japanese: ……はい。
translation: ...Yes.

japanese:
フータローも同じことを考えてたんだろうね。
五月に理由を聞かれて、すごく動揺してたし。
translation:
Futaro was probably thinking the same thing.
He seemed very agitated when Itsuki asked him about it.

japanese: 本当に、そうだといいのですが。
translation: Well, I at least hope so.

japanese:
学園祭じゃ誰も選ばないって言ってたけど、
ここ半年で、さすがに無責任だって
感じたんじゃない？
translation:
He said that he'd choose no one at the school festival,
but he might have felt irresponsible for saying that
in the past six months.

japanese: じゃあ上杉さん、気持ちを変えてくれたってこと？
translation: So, Uesugi-san might've changed his mind?

japanese:
あまり変わったようには見えませんでしたが、
なにか、思うところくらいはあったのかもしれません。
translation:
It doesn't really look like he has,
but it does look like he's pondering something.

japanese:
学園祭のあとは、
受験が本格化して忙しかったのもあるし。
translation:
After the school festival,
things got busy with the exams intensifying.

japanese:
でも、受験もなんとか終わったもんね！
きっと上杉さんにも考える時間ができたんだ。
translation:
Yet we managed to get through the exams somehow!
I'm sure Uesugi-san also had some time to think.

japanese:
そうだとしても、
私たちに残された時間は、もう、ほとんどない。
translation: Even so, we have hardly any time left.

japanese: 旅行が終われば、フータローは東京に行っちゃう。
translation: Once the trip is over, Futaro will go to Tokyo.

japanese:
そうよ。
なのに――
translation:
That's right.
And yet%p-2;――

japanese: こんな生ぬるい関係のままだなんて、私は絶対に嫌。
translation: I absolutely hate being in this lukewarm relationship.

japanese:
あの後夜祭の夜から、
私の気持ちは一度たりとも変わってないんだから。
translation:
Since the night of the festival,
my feelings haven't changed even once.

japanese:
私も同じ。
フータローには答えを出して欲しい。
translation:
I feel the same.
I want Futaro to give us an answer.

japanese:
たとえ、それが望んだ結果じゃなくても、
受け入れる覚悟はとっくにできてる。
translation:
Even if it's not the result I want,
I'm ready to accept it.

japanese: この卒業旅行は、私たちにとって最後のチャンス。
translation: This graduation trip is our last chance.

japanese: もう、私と三玖は決めたわ。
translation: Miku and I have already made up our minds.

japanese:
それで、改めて聞くけど。
あんたたちはどうなの？
translation:
So, let me ask again.
What about you guys?

japanese: 四葉？
translation: Yotsuba?

japanese: 私は、みんなの想いが報われる時が来てほしい。
translation:
I hope that the time will come when 
everyone's feelings will be fulfilled.

japanese: みんなの、ですか。
translation: Everyone's, huh?

japanese:
うん。
上杉さんが誰を選ぶとかじゃなくてさ。
translation:
Yeah.
It's not just about who Uesugi-san chooses.

japanese:
いまここにある、みんなの想いを受け止めて……
その上で答えを出して欲しい。
translation:
We want him to accept everyone's feelings,
and then give us an answer.

japanese:
私は、それが一番、
上杉さんのためにもなると思うんだよね。
translation: I think that's the best thing for Uesugi-san, as well.

japanese: 上杉君に答えを出してもらうことには、私も賛成です。
translation: I, too, agree with getting an answer from Uesugi-kun.

japanese:
こんな、明らかにいざこざになりそうな企て、
あんたなら真っ先に反対するかと思ったけど。
translation:
Despite this obviously tanglesome plan,
I thought you would be the first to oppose it.

japanese:
それぞれの想いや考えがどうであれ、
私たちはみんな、彼が答えを出すことを
待ち望んでいます。
translation:
Whatever our thoughts or feelings,
we are all waiting for him to give an answer.

japanese:
あの夜から、ずっと……
立ち止まったままなのですから。
translation:
Ever since that night...
we've been at a standstill.

japanese: それに、これが良い機会になれば……。
translation: Besides, this could be a good opportunity...

japanese: なにが？
translation: What is?

japanese: えっ？
translation: Huh?

japanese: いま、良い機会にって言ったよね。
translation: You said this could be a good opportunity, didn't you?
Ah...

japanese:
えっと、ほら、あれです！
上杉君に、自分の優柔不断さを
じっくりと反省してもらう良い機会かなと。
translation:
Ahh, um, you know!
A good opportunity for Uesugi-kun
to reflect on his indecisiveness.

japanese:
五月は厳しいなぁ。
さすがの上杉さんでも反省してるよ。
translation:
Itsuki, you're so harsh.
Our Uesugi-san is definitely reflecting on it.

japanese: 反省かはわからないけど。
translation: I don't know if he IS reflecting.

japanese:
一花。
あんたも好きなんでしょ。
translation:
Ichika.
You like him too, don't you?

japanese: うわ、いきなり来たなぁ。
translation: Whoa, that came out of nowhere.

japanese: 一花はどうしたいの？
translation: What do you want to do, Ichika?

japanese:
うーん、フータロー君が
ここまで優柔不断だとは思わなかったかな。
さすがに困っちゃうよ。
translation:
Hmm, I didn't think Futaro-kun
would be so indecisive up to this point.
It's really quite troubling.

japanese:
誤魔化そうったって無駄よ。
あんたはまだ諦めてない。
translation:
Even if you try to deceive us, it's useless.
You haven't given up yet.

japanese: わかってるわ、それくらい。
translation: I know that much.

japanese: ……ホント、困るなぁ。
translation: ...This really is so troublesome.

japanese: そもそも諦める必要ないよ？
translation: But, you don't have to give up?

japanese: 三玖……。
translation: Miku...

japanese: あと、我慢する必要もない。
translation: And, you don't need to hold back.
Huh...?

japanese:
あの時、フータローが誰も選ばないって決めたのは
フータロー自身の決断だから。
translation:
When Futaro decided that he wouldn't choose anyone
at that time, it was his own decision.

japanese:
そして、もう一度答えを出そうとしてくれてるのも、
フータロー自身が決めたことだよ。
translation:
The fact is that he is trying again to give us an answer
but that's his own decision.

japanese: 私たちは全員が同じライバルで、選ぶのはフータロー。
translation:
We're all rivals,
and it's Futaro who will choose.

japanese:
一花が選んで欲しいと思っても、
私たちはみんな、非難なんてしない。
translation: Ichika, we won't blame you if you want him to choose you.

japanese: どうしたいかは、あんた次第ってことよ。
translation: What you want to do, is up to you.

japanese: 一花……。
translation: Ichika...
